subject: Golf
lead_paragraph: If Tiger Woods shepherded golf to a new place in the United States, Lorena Ochoa might one day be his equivalent in Mexico, a country of over 103 million still learning the intricacies of the sport.
snippet: If Tiger Woods shepherded golf to a new place in the United States, Lorena Ochoa might one day be his equivalent in Mexico, a country of over 103 million still learning the intricacies of the sport.
